cont.entity_a: Has similar capabilities to today's cell phones in harsh lighting conditions. Synchronizes to 1/500 sec in flash mode with an external Nikon flash SB-600. Easy to use for beginners with a lot of options and manual settings. 6.1MP is considered decent, emphasizing the importance of the photographer's skill. A good entry-level DSLR with a lot of features.
cont.entity_b: D2xs camera body arrived in perfect condition. Performs very well for an older pro body. The D2x and D2xs are about 90% the same. Considered a great performer despite newer models like the D300, D700, and D3s.

cont.entity_a: The body is solid, heavy, utilitarian, and highly functional without unnecessary features. The camera body and equipment arrived in excellent condition and performed as if new.
cont.entity_b: The camera is very tough and reliable, suitable for long-term use. The camera is a workhorse with a strong build. The autofocus is faster than manual focus, but the camera is heavy.

cont.entity_a: Excellent image quality with crisp and clear photos. Noise is practically non-existent at ISO 200 due to larger photosensors.
cont.entity_b: Produces sharp 16x24 prints with a good lens. Offers excellent low ISO performance and outstanding image quality.

cont.entity_a: Compatible with old film AF lenses and manual lenses, but manual focus is required with non-AF lenses.
The color capture sensor is accurate and matches well with the Fuji Frontier printer.
There is a known issue with the CF card holder being ceramic and prone to cracking.
Great battery life, lasting for weeks even with daily use. Battery life is impressive, lasting for over 500 photos in raw format.
The camera is dependable and well-made, suitable for beginners to intermediate users.
cont.entity_b: Review screen is small, and picture quality is not as good as the D300.
